mapper.insert: insert into tb_join_waiting (join_num, team_num, user_no, join_intro, join_original_filename, join_rename_filename) values ((select max(join_num) +1 from tb_join_waiting), #{team_num}, #{user_no}, #{join_intro}, #{join_original_filename}, #{join_rename_filename})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_join_waiting where user_no = #{ user_no } and team_num = #{ team_num }
